Multibagger Stock: Jump despite market crash! 2244% up in 2024 – Rs 120 cr Reliance Industries' order - ET Now
summary:
Multibagger Stock: Jump despite market crash! 2244% up in 2024 – Rs 120 cr Reliance Industries' order

Updated Dec 17, 2024 16:13 IST

Bharat Global Developers’ shares surged 5% despite a market crash, reaching an intraday high of ₹1304.75, following a ₹120 crore order from Reliance Industries.

  • Bharat Global Developers announced completion of a Fluidized Catalytic Cracker (FCC) project for Reliance Industries.
  • The company has a strong order book exceeding ₹1,500 crore, including contracts from notable clients like Tata Agro and McCain India.
  • Bharat Global Developers recently approved a 1:10 stock split and an 8:10 bonus share issuance.
  • The record date for the stock split is set for December 26, 2024.
  • The stock has delivered 2244% returns in 2024, with significant recent gains of 27% in the past week and 579% over the last six months.
“We assure our stakeholders that the company remains focused on its growth trajectory.”

This surge highlights the significant potential of Bharat Global Developers as a multibagger stock, especially in a year marked by extraordinary returns.
newTitle: Multibagger Stock: Jump despite market crash! 2244% up in 2024 – Rs 120 cr Reliance Industries' order

title: Largest in Asia! Anil Ambani’s Reliance Power bags big solar, battery storage project – Details - ET Now
summary:
Largest in Asia! Anil Ambani’s Reliance Power bags big solar, battery storage project – Details

Publication Date: Dec 17, 2024 Source: ET Now

Reliance Power has achieved a significant milestone by securing India's largest solar and battery storage project, with a total capacity of 2,000 MW.

  • Reliance Power has bagged India's single largest project of solar and battery storage system.
  • It has secured the largest individual allocation out of the 5 companies vying for a total capacity of 2,000 MW.
  • Anil Ambani-led RPower stock has rallied 94% in 2024.
“The project will see the largest deployment of grid storage batteries at a single site, not only in India but also in Asia.”

This significant project is expected to deliver peak power supply and ease the power procurement challenges faced by DISCOMs in India.
newTitle: Reliance Power Secures Major Solar and Battery Storage Project in Asia

title: Vishal Mega Mart IPO Listing Date: Check share listing price prediction on NSE, BSE - ET Now
summary:
Vishal Mega Mart IPO Listing Date: Check share listing price prediction on NSE, BSE

Date: Updated Dec 17, 2024

Source: ET NOW

The Vishal Mega Mart IPO will see its shares listed on December 18, following a successful bidding process. The IPO garnered considerable interest, with solid subscription across categories.

  • The IPO price band is set between Rs 74 to Rs 78 per share, with a minimum lot size of 190 shares.
  • Overall subscription was 28.75 times, with retail subscribed 2.43 times, QIB 85.11 times, and NII 15.01 times.
  • The expected listing price is around Rs 98.50, reflecting a potential listing gain of approximately 26.28% based on current grey market premium.
  • Vishal Mega Mart experienced a 17.41% revenue growth in FY24, with a 43.78% rise in profit after tax.
  • The public offer is an offer for sale, meaning the company won't receive proceeds from the IPO.
"Disclaimer: The above article is meant for informational purposes only, and should not be considered as any investment advice."

Investors are encouraged to consult financial advisors before making investment decisions in light of the upcoming IPO listing.
newTitle: Vishal Mega Mart IPO Listing Date: Share Price Predictions and Details

title: Big move by Azim Premji, signs Rs 3397068000 deal to acquire…, big challenge to Ratan Tata’s TCS, Narayana Mu - India.com
summary:
Azim Premji's Wipro Acquires AVT for Rs 3397068000 in Major IT Deal

Publication Date: December 17, 2024

Source: India.com

Azim Premji led Wipro has announced its acquisition of Applied Value Technologies (AVT), a Massachusetts-based IT consulting firm, for $40 million. The acquisition is part of Wipro’s strategy to enhance its application services capabilities and drive growth during its ongoing business turnaround.

  1. Wipro acquires AVT for Rs 3397068000 to expand its IT services capabilities.
  2. The deal is expected to close by December 31, 2024, subject to regulatory approvals.
  3. AVT provides enterprise application development and support services with significant revenue growth.
  4. Wipro's acquisition is part of a larger strategy to enhance domain expertise and drive long-term growth.
  5. This move poses a competitive challenge to TCS and Infosys in the Indian IT market.
"AVT helps enterprises transform IT operations through a highly customized and data-driven approach. This acquisition will strengthen Wipro’s existing application services capabilities and create new growth opportunities."

The acquisition reflects Wipro’s continued focus on expanding its service capabilities and strengthening its position as a leader in global IT solutions.
newTitle: Azim Premji's Wipro Acquires AVT for Rs 3397068000 in Major IT Deal

title: Adani deal under US bribery scrutiny was approved against officials' advice - The Economic Times
summary:
Adani Deal Under US Bribery Scrutiny Approved Against Officials' Advice

Publication Date: Recent
Source: Reuters

The Adani deal, involving a $490 million solar power agreement in Andhra Pradesh, is under investigation by U.S. prosecutors for alleged bribery, despite opposition from state energy and finance officials.

  • The Solar Energy Corporation of India approached Andhra Pradesh for a massive solar deal contrary to earlier advice from state regulators.
  • The state government, under Chief Minister YS Jagan Mohan Reddy, approved the deal quickly, securing regulatory nods in just 57 days.
  • The arrangement is said to benefit Adani Green, with 97% of funds allocated to the company.
  • U.S. prosecutors allege $228 million was offered to an Andhra Pradesh official to facilitate the deal.
  • The deal’s approval process has raised concerns regarding its alignment with financial advice from the state's authorities.
“Together they provide a picture of how political leaders overruled advice from finance and energy officials in order to approve the massive Adani deal.”

The approval of this deal may lead to significant financial strain on the state, as confirmed by various state officials and analysts.
newTitle: Adani Deal Under US Bribery Scrutiny Approved Against Officials' Advice

ITC Sets Jan. 1 As Effective Date For Demerger Of Hotel Business - NDTV Profit
summary:
ITC Sets Jan. 1 As Effective Date For Demerger Of Hotel Business

Date & Source: 17 Dec 2024, 12:19 PM IST - NDTV Profit

ITC has set the effective date of the demerger of its hotel business as Jan. 1, 2025.

  • ITC and ITC Hotels Ltd. have mutually acknowledged that all conditions specified in the scheme of arrangement have been fulfilled and satisfied.
  • The company received approval from the Kolkata bench of the National Company Law Tribunal for the spinoff of its hotel business in October.
  • ITC announced its plans to demerge its hotel business in August 2023 into a separate entity, maintaining 40% ownership of ITC Hotels, with shareholders acquiring the remaining 60%.
  • Shareholders approved the demerger with a majority of 99.6%, despite opposition from a domestic proxy advisory firm.
ITC said that the hotels business has matured over the years and is well poised to chart its own growth path as a separate entity in the fast-growing hospitality industry.

The ITC share price saw a sharp uptick at the back of the news and recovered to trade in the green.
newTitle: ITC Sets Jan. 1 As Effective Date For Demerger Of Hotel Business

title: Indian rupee hits record low against UAE dirham due to trade deficit woes - Khaleej Times
ITC Hotels demerger to come into effect from January 1, 2025 - The Economic Times
summary:
ITC Hotels Demerger to Take Effect on January 1, 2025

Publication Date: Tuesday
Source: Kolkata-based ITC

ITC announced that the demerger of ITC Hotels will take effect from January 1, 2025, following approvals from the National Company Law Tribunal (NCLT).

  • The NCLT approved the scheme in October.
  • All conditions for the demerger have been fulfilled as of December 16.
  • Shareholders approved the demerger in June, and the Competition Commission of India cleared it in May.
  • ITC will maintain 40% ownership of ITC Hotels; shareholders receive the remaining 60% based on their stakes.
  • ITC Hotels reported a 12.1% revenue growth in the September quarter.
“ITC Limited and ITC Hotels Limited have mutually acknowledged that all the conditions specified... have been fulfilled.”

This move positions ITC Hotels as a separate entity, ready for growth with a focused business strategy.
newTitle: ITC Hotels Demerger to Take Effect on January 1, 2025

Ripple reveals official launch for RLUSD, XRP eyes new all-time high at $4.75 - FXStreet
summary:
Ripple Launches RLUSD Stablecoin; XRP Eyes $4.75 High

Date: December 16, 2024 | Source: FXStreet

Ripple has officially announced that its RLUSD stablecoin will launch on December 17, 2024, with expectations of advancing XRP’s price towards an all-time high.

  • Ripple's RLUSD stablecoin will launch on multiple platforms including MoonPay, Uphold, and others.
  • XRP is projected to possibly reach a new all-time high of $4.75 following regulatory approvals.
  • Monica Long, Ripple's president, highlighted the significance of RLUSD's introduction for XRP Ledger.
The release of RLUSD marks a new chapter – both for the XRP Ledger, as well as @Ripple for use in our $70B+ payments flows. — Monica Long (@MonicaLongSF) December 16, 2024

The RLUSD stablecoin is designed to maintain a peg with the US dollar, supporting cross-border applications.
newTitle: Ripple Launches RLUSD Stablecoin; XRP Eyes $4.75 High

title: 7-Seater Maruti Suzuki Grand Vitara Spotted With Brand New Design - GaadiWaadi.com
summary:
7-Seater Maruti Suzuki Grand Vitara Spotted With Brand New Design

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: Gaadi Waadi

Maruti Suzuki is preparing to launch a new three-row version of the Grand Vitara by mid-2025, featuring a fresh design that draws inspiration from its upcoming e Vitara electric vehicle.

  • The new Grand Vitara will have a more upscale design with major styling changes compared to the current model.
  • It will feature an extended rear for accommodating a third row of seating.
  • Interior enhancements include a new dashboard, a large touchscreen, and advanced driver-assist features.
  • Powertrain options likely include a mild-hybrid and a strong-hybrid petrol engine.
  • The vehicle will enter a competitive market alongside established models like the Tata Safari and MG Hector Plus.
“Upon its debut, the Y17 will take the top spot as Maruti Suzuki’s flagship internal combustion engine SUV.”

With the significant redesign and hybrid offerings, the Maruti Suzuki Grand Vitara aims to attract consumers looking for spacious and eco-friendly options in the SUV segment.
newTitle: 7-Seater Maruti Suzuki Grand Vitara Spotted With Brand New Design

title: New Hyundai 7-Seater Confirmed For January 2025! - MotorOctane
summary:
New Hyundai 7-Seater SUV Confirmed For January 2025!

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: MotorOctane

Hyundai has confirmed the upcoming launch of its new 7-seater SUV in India as part of its strategic growth initiative in response to increasing demand for larger vehicles.

  • The Ioniq 9 electric SUV will debut in India at the Bharat Mobility show in January 2025.
  • This SUV will showcase several segment-first technologies and luxurious features.
  • The model will accommodate 7 passengers and offers unique seating arrangements and advanced technology.
  • Hyundai aims to take advantage of the growing popularity of 7-seater SUVs in the Indian market.
“The new Ioniq 9 is expected to deliver a range of up to 620 km on a single charge.”

The Ioniq 9 is projected to have a significant impact on Hyundai's market presence and aims to meet the needs of consumers looking for innovative and spacious electric vehicles.
newTitle: New Hyundai 7-Seater SUV Set to Launch in January 2025
